definition: to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Coud you please go and fetch my teaching pictures?
sentences.chinese: 請去把我的教學掛圖取來好嗎？

sentences.english: Letters, maps, and pictures are documents.
sentences.chinese: 信件，掛圖，圖片都是文獻。

sentences.english: Teacher: Look at this picture. What can you see in the picture?
sentences.chinese: 教師出示教學掛圖，並與學生一起看圖進行對話，如。

sentences.english: Consider using a flip chart, overhead projector or a blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 可以考慮利用一個活動掛圖，投影儀或者一個黑板。

sentences.english: Whether we can succeed in compiling school wall map will directly influence teaching effect.
sentences.chinese: 教學掛圖編制的成敗直接影響課堂教學效果。

sentences.english: Pelham moved across to indicate a wall chart .
sentences.chinese: 佩勒姆走過去指着一張掛圖。
